WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has been open for 30+ days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with current files and references to the versions affected.
WorkItem.Description: Would be nice to have this even roughly modeled, if only by giving it an average-rated MP5 value (roughly 75 MP5, dependent on exact length of fight).

Comments.Message: Figured out editing equipment, still should be added in by default, probably outside of the scope of HolyPriest model, though.
Uhm, Insightful Earthstorm Diamond is modelled, check Charts -> MP5 Sources.

It's modeled incorrectly. It loads with an Old Equipment Proc, and an incorrect one, at that (states 300 mana 5% chance). Try changing the value - it's only calculating the effect of Intellect by default. I removed that effect and replaced it with a Special Effect 600 Mana Restore (10% on SpellCast/45 Sec) and it calculates much more accurately.

Okay, here Insightful Earthsiege Diamond is 600 Mana Restore (5% on spell cast, 15s cooldown). This is the new WotlK gem.

The old gem, Insightful Earthstorm Diamond has no "new" proc, that is correct. This is the old TBC gem.

Should probably make a new issue and write in Insightful Earthstorm Diamond (TBC Gem).
Why would I be referring to the old gem by saying IED? That's ridiculous.
Because the old Gem doesn't work. The new one does. (In my version of Rawr).
